title: Angular 2 application in IE from localhost working and not working while using computername/IP
body: Well, I have created site using Angular 2. When I run "ng-serve" command and trying to test my site using "http://localhost:4200" in Google Chrome and IE11 it works perfectly, but, if I build project using "ng-build --prod", host it on IIS. Site still works on Chrome, but IE11 shows the following
